title: The reasoning for permanently bans
body:
My main account got permanently banned before almost a year for typing kys(keep yourself safe :) ).
I played on this account from the point shyvana was released, like before 8 years or such. I got banned for writing 3 WORDS riot games. I started playing when I didn't understand a thing from chat and I was like this troll kid who went duo top with his friends. I went on and got to gold. 
- I want to point that every second game in gold I saw that someone wrote "kys" in chat so I didn't take it hard or something, I thought its like idiot and I never thought about it, BECAUSE ITS JUST A VIDEO GAME.

anyways, after I got my first suspension for "bad behavior" for 2 weeks, I thought its about how much I am writing in games. I didn't think for a moment that I got banned for writing "kys" one time in chat, I wrote a lot at this moment of time because I wanted to get my anger out( I just wrote A LOT in chat, no curses or something like that). 

After a ban, I tried to keep my chat clean, I didn't write at all in chat, only tried to cummonicate through it to win the game.
But, I got on a lose streak and I wrote kys once to a player, and I got the permanently banned account, that I spent a lot of time from my childhood on.

If you want to see my chat logs from this ONE GAME here it is:

Well, I didn't look at this chat log for half a year, trying to forget what happened to my first account.
I got banned for ONE GAME.
Here is my question for you guys:
Is it even fair to permanently ban a player with this chat logs for ONE GAME, after he played 8 years without writing a thing in chat? After he spent a lot of his free time on this game for nothing.

I am not like tyler1, or some other extreme toxic players, I am just a 16 years old child, who got his account banned for having an extremely bad game.

So I got to ask you a question. Why people can't just mute the player that write them the "kys" instead of biying a cry baby and write "REPORTED" and report you after the game?? That's why riot made the mute button, right?
Another question for you, why can't riot make a PERMANENTLY MUTE punishment?

I opened a discussion on this and some people answered me that riot doesn't permanently mute people because if they are muted they will feed or int or be toxic in any other way.

But, there are some players who just get frusirated from one game so they write those kind of stuff. They didn't get a permanent ban for 5 accounts, or run it down mid because someone wrote something that's not in place.

Back to the question now. why can't riot make a PERMANENTLY MUTE punishment after the 2 week suspension or before???
